duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and approve risk profiles, defining cash exposure and minimizing loss.
Analyze large datasets, create simulations, and validate risk profiles using data analytics and financial modeling.
Utilize statistical tools for regression, time-series, permutations, combinations, standard deviation, short term and long term forecasting.
Understand and apply CMS/DOI policies & procedures to effectively evaluate risk profiles.
Work with multiple stakeholders to assimilate data, prepare cases, and issue policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, Insurance, or related field (Master's preferred)
